ygData.subject: RE: Corpse Recoveries
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: JasonF [mailto:JasonF@pigging.com] ... offshore to look for his corpse in the direction that I gave him.  Believe me I wished him well, but I
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: JasonF [mailto:JasonF@...]

>>The last time I saw this guy he was understandably upset, but swimming
offshore to look for his corpse in the direction that I gave him. Believe
me
I wished him well, but I couldn't put my character in that potentially
disarterous position.

How would others have handled this situation? Given it's midnight, and you
plan on logging within an hour or so and there's no bank on the island.<<


That happened to a guild member and good friend of mine. We both agreed
that it was ridiculous to try to swim all the way to the zone. He
/petitioned and explained that he was killed on the boat and the corpse was
dumped when the boat zoned. The guide kindly summoned his corpse for him,
since it was where it was through no fault of his own.

Paralto of Povar
